mapper.sql: p.party_id AS partyId, p.party_name AS partyName, p.created_by AS createdBy, p.created_at AS createdAt
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO party(party_name, created_by, created_at) VALUES (#{partyName}, #{createdBy}, SYSDATE())
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM party p INNER JOIN party_members pm ON p.party_id = pm.party_id WHERE user_id = #{userId}
